fields.description:
Add LineHeight property for AttributedString
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/8558
fields.summary: iOS: Add paragraph styles to AttributedString

comments.body: Hey Flavio, thanks for the PR! Please add Android parity, docs, unit-tests and example-code for your PR, thx!

I'll address today.

But, there's no Android parity, cause AttributedString are missing on Android. Right?

Oh, I didn't notices that, sorry :)
I'll indagate on how to implement in Android.
Thank you.
Moving out of 6.2.0, since we are trying to finalize the version the upcoming weeks and the PR has outstanding code-review adjustments.

Verified the fix on SDK 7.5.0.v20180919120117. Works fine.Closing
